subject: Fashion
title: The Resale Market Boom
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Resale Market Boom.

hook.text: The secondhand clothing market is growing 25 times faster than the broader retail sector.

buildup.text: Platforms like ThredUp, Depop, and Poshmark turned used clothes into a $200+ billion global market.

discovery.text: Gen Z drives the trend: 40% of their wardrobe is secondhand. Thrifting is now a status symbol.

twist.text: Critics say resale just enables more buying. People sell old stuff to fund new fast fashion hauls.

climax.text: Resale helps only if it replaces new purchases. If it just funds more shopping, the impact is zero.

punchline.text: Secondhand is booming. Whether it saves the planet depends.

quiz.question: What percentage of Gen Z's wardrobe reportedly comes from secondhand sources?
